name: cloudwatch-monitoring
description: Comprehensive CloudWatch monitoring tool for alarms, metrics, and logs analysis. Supports alarm management, metric data retrieval, and log querying for AWS resources troubleshooting.

query.description: Natural language query describing the CloudWatch operation needed

operation.description: CloudWatch operation to perform (describe_alarms, get_metric_data, query_logs, list_log_groups, get_log_events, create_alarm, delete_alarm)

alarm_names.description: List of alarm names for alarm operations

start_time.description: Start time for metric/log queries (ISO format or relative like '1h', '24h')

end_time.description: End time for metric/log queries (ISO format or relative like 'now')

log_group_name.description: CloudWatch Logs group name for log operations

log_stream_name.description: CloudWatch Logs stream name for specific log stream operations

filter_pattern.description: CloudWatch Logs filter pattern for log queries

statistic.description: Metric statistic (Average, Sum, Maximum, Minimum, SampleCount)

threshold.description: Alarm threshold value for create_alarm operation

comparison_operator.description: Alarm comparison operator (GreaterThanThreshold, GreaterThanOrEqualToThreshold, LessThanThreshold, LessThanOrEqualToThreshold)
